thread.title: Hong Kong Open semi-finals to feature top four seeded players
thread.title_full: Hong Kong Open semi-finals to feature top four seeded players

title: Hong Kong Open semi-finals to feature top four seeded players
text:
Hong Kong Open semi-finals to feature top four seeded players 16 Oct 2015 15:02:08 
comments 
The semi-finals of the Hong Kong Open will pit the four highest-seeded players against each other. 
Top seed Garbine Muguruza withdrew prior to the tournament leaving Angelique Kerber, Venus Williams, Jelena Jankovic and Sam Stosur as the leading quartet. 
Kerber could book a spot at the WTA Finals in Singapore by winning the tournament and she stayed on track to do just that with a 7-5 6-3 victory over Caroline Garcia. 
Third seed Williams had never lost a set against Alize Cornet and she continued that record, hammering the Frenchwoman 6-1 6-1. 
Williams will next play Jankovic, who beat Daria Gavrilova by the same scoreline, while Stosur looked in trouble at a set and a break down to Heather Watson but won the final 11 games to set up a meeting with Kerber. Related Sport News
